18212668.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

repnme.cdata!:
Portugal - Second Small and Medium Industry
            Development Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support the
            Government's strategy for industrial growth and
            employment and forthcoming EEC accession, which assigns high
            priority to the development of the SMI sector. The project
            would support investment and rehabilitation programs of
            Portuguese SMIs through a program of policy dialogue and
            technical and financial assistance. The project seeks to
            ensure the long-term viability of existing SMI employment
            and to create new jobs at modest capital costs per job. It
            would also continue the ongoing efforts to strengthen
            appraisal and support capacities of financial and technical
            assistance institutions serving SMIs.

Portugal - Second Small and Medium Industry
            Development Project
